locations.name: Dorm - Chestnut Residence
locations.brief_description: Your dorm that your share with your roommate.
locations.long_description: Your dorm at Chestnut Residence. It's a bit far from campus, but at least you have your own bathroom.

locations.name: Dining Commons - Chestnut Residence
locations.brief_description: You can eat some food here.
locations.long_description: Your residence dining hall. The food is okay, but at least it's mandatory. You were here pretty late last night, but you don't seem to recall much...

locations.name: King's College Circle
locations.brief_description: Front campus. From here, you can access Hart House at the north, the Gerstein Science Information Centre to your east, the Bahen Centre for Information Technology to your west, and Chestnut to your south.
locations.long_description: The heart of UofT, where you can see the iconic view of University College. It's quite cold, so there aren't many students around. From here, you can access Hart House at the north, the Gerstein Science Information Centre to your east, the Bahen Centre for Information Technology to your west, and Chestnut to your south.

items.name: deodorant
items.description: There is a stick of deodorant on your nightstand. You should probably use this
